last_episode_to_air.name: Ship Appearance
last_episode_to_air.overview: Criss attempts the largest scale appearance of his career while on a working vacation to Cabo San Lucas. Criss also blows minds when he disfigures a spectator and reveals how to make a plate balance on a playing card.

name: Criss Angel BeLIEve
overview: The creative process behind the illusions and demonstrations from conception to execution. It is centered on stunts and street magic acts by Criss Angel.

episodes.name: Cement Grave
episodes.overview: Criss attempts to become the first person in history to succeed escaping from a Cement Grave alive. Criss also reveals how to levitate a soda can, and gives rapper Ice-T a bloody demonstration in a barbershop.

episodes.name: Blind
episodes.overview: Criss trains with Olympic Gold Medalist, Jordyn Wieber, before attempting a potentially deadly walk across an I-beam high above a crowd - blindfolded. Criss also blows rapper Ludacris' mind in a costly magic stun

episodes.name: Bullet Catch
episodes.overview: Criss Angel BeLIEve is the new series that will take viewers into the world of magic like never before. Each episode will focus on one principle of magic and Criss' quest to perform the greatest mind-blowing stunt.

episodes.name: Raise the Dead
episodes.overview: Criss Angel BeLIEve is the new series that will take viewers into the world of magic like never before. Each episode will focus on one principle of magic and Criss' quest to perform the greatest mind-blowing stunt.

episodes.name: Levitate Shaq
episodes.overview: After years of being called out Criss attempts to levitate his friend, amateur magician & NBA star Shaquille O'Neal. Shaq spends the week at the Magic Factory & Criss reveals a mind-blowing Ash to Palm illusion to strangers.

episodes.name: Alligator Torture Escape
episodes.overview: Criss attempts to become the first person to escape from a suspended torture device designed by Houdini's rival. Criss also shows Jesse how to pick a lock and puts a million dollars on the line to test his own ability to focus.

episodes.name: Lord of Illusions
episodes.overview: Inspired by a twisted Clive Barker film, Criss makes a prediction where he'll be impaled by a sword if he's wrong. Criss also reveals a method of his magic to horror director Eli Roth & hits the streets to truly bug people out!

episodes.name: Double Straight Jacket
episodes.overview: Criss pays tribute to a classic Houdini escape by hanging from his feet in two straight jackets with a weight tied around his neck. Criss also trains with Randy Couture and visits his childhood home to reveal his first trick.

episodes.name: Elephant Herd Vanish
episodes.overview: Criss attempts to become the first person in history to make a herd of elephants disappear. Criss also freaks out customers at a toy store and shocks bar patrons by bringing a cracker to life.

episodes.name: Ship Appearance
episodes.overview: Criss attempts the largest scale appearance of his career while on a working vacation to Cabo San Lucas. Criss also blows minds when he disfigures a spectator and reveals how to make a plate balance on a playing card.
